law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1514, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 27, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 427, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 476, sec. 29, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 496, sec. 48, effective April 10, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996; and ch. 371, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 67, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 7, effective February 26, 1982; and ch. 320, sec. 41, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 357, subtit. 38, sec. 20, effective June 21, 1974.
